text: Bob Stokoe (21 September 1930 – 1 February 2004) was an English footballer and football manager. In 1955, he won an FA Cup winner's medal with Newcastle United. ==Honours== ===As a player=== Newcastle United *FA Cup winner: 1955 ===As manager=== Blackpool *Anglo-Italian Cup winners: 1971 Sunderland *FA Cup winners: 1973 *Second Division championship: 1975–76 == References == Category:1930 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Northumberland
title: Bob Stokoe
